subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Senate Passes Iraq Withdrawal Timetable
body:
In a 51-46 vote mostly along party lines, the Democratic-controlled Senate 
passed legislation to require a timetable for the withdrawal of U.S. troops 
from Iraq.

Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details. 

Wireless photo and video alerts from CBSNews.com, direct to your phone. Subscribe now at http://www.cbsnews.com/htdocs/wireless/index.php.
